item.description:
Come join the Springfield Naturalists' Club, a group that is sponsoring a public hike, approx. 5 miles RT on an easy paved path, till 2pm at beautiful Quabbin reservoir. Meetup members will get together after the hike, details to be decided, with options for swimming, drinks, dining. To register & for any questions call Bill Fontaine of the Naturalist Club 413-533-2153.
http://www.hikingwebs...
http://www.mass.gov/d...
http://www.mass.gov/d...
** We will meet the Naturalists' Club at the Stop & Shop plaza, the bank parking lot, off of Rte. 9 at 10:00 a.m. The hike is in the Rattlesnake Hill area, I believe, in Orange, MA, around access Gate 29, the northern end of Quabbin.
item.how_to_find_us: Only people going on this hike will be meeting at this location
item.name: Quabbin Hike and Get Together
